00001 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! bianchi2_globaldata_mod -- BIANCHI2 library global data class
00003 !
00004 !! Stores global data required in bianchi2 data routines.  Ideally one would 
00005 !! avoid global data passed in this way, however it is required to get data
00006 !! into the routines taken by the numerical recipes functions used in
00007 !! computing bianchi2 templates.
00008 !
00009 !! @author A. N. Lasenby & J. D. McEwen (mcewen@mrao.cam.ac.uk)
00010 !! @version 0.1 March 2006
00011 !
00012 ! Revisions:
00013 !   March 2006 - Written by Jason McEwen 
00014 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00015 
00016 module bianchi2_globaldata_mod
00017 
00018   use s2_types_mod
00019 
00020   integer, parameter :: b2gd_ntmax = 101
00021   integer, parameter :: b2gd_nvars = 4
00022 
00023   integer :: b2gd_it
00024   integer :: b2gd_nt
00025 
00026   real :: b2gd_treal(b2gd_ntmax)
00027   real :: b2gd_xreal(b2gd_ntmax)
00028 !   real, allocatable :: b2gd_treal(:)
00029 !   real, allocatable :: b2gd_xreal(:)
00030 
00031   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_Omega_matter
00032   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_Omega_Lambda
00033   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_alpha, b2gd_Bianchi_h
00034   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_RH_start
00035   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_ze
00036   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_theta_0, b2gd_phi_0     ! ANL's angle convention.
00037 
00038   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_xarr(b2gd_nvars, b2gd_ntmax)
00039   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_tarr(b2gd_ntmax)
00040 !   real(s2_dp), allocatable :: b2gd_tarr(:)
00041 !   real(s2_dp), allocatable :: b2gd_xarr(:, :)
00042 
00043   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_tstop
00044   real(s2_dp) :: b2gd_deltat
00045 
00046 end module bianchi2_globaldata_mod
